name: Chaos Saw
description:
Chaos Saw - Hardcore 2D game, if you are not good with nerves, I do not advise you to run this game, it will make you very angry, but if you do run the game, take care of your mouse. This is a game in which we play the role of a ball, he got on the rotating platforms and our task is not to get under the saws. You need to get the ball to the finish line. You can rotate the platform around its axis by throwing the balloon. You can freeze the ball in one place by pressing the "FIX" button.

  • Increasing difficulty
  • 15 levels
  • Nice graphics
  • Interesting puzzle
  • Sound effects
  • Physics
